Class Automaton

  • java.lang.Object
    • Automaton
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ElementaryAutomaton, TotalisticAutomaton
    public abstract class Automaton
extends java.lang.Object
    Automaton is an abstract class that generates either an Elementary Cellular Automaton or a Totalistic Automaton given a rule.
    Author:
    Natalie Hill

      Modifier and Type Field Description
      char falseSymbol  
      char trueSymbol

    • Method Detail

      • ruleTableString

        public java.lang.String ruleTableString()
        This method uses the Rule classes ruleTable String to create a new rule table.
        Returns:
        a String representation of all possible rules and their outcomes

      • createAutomaton

        public static Automaton createAutomaton​(CellularAutomaton ca,
                                        int ruleNum,
                                        Generation initial)
                                 throws RuleNumException
        This method creates either an Elementary or Totalistic Automaton using enums.
        Parameters:
        ca - the current Cellular Automaton
        ruleNum - the rule number
        initial - the first created generation
        Returns:
        either a Totalistic or Elementary Automaton
        Throws:
        RuleNumException - if the ruleNum is not in the range for either Elementary or Totalistic rules.

      • evolve

        public int evolve​(int numSteps)
        This method creates the amount of generations passed in numSteps, so long as numSteps is not less than or equal to 0.
        Parameters:
        numSteps - the number steps the Automaton should evolve
        Returns:
        the number of steos the Automaton should evolve

      • getGeneration

        public Generation getGeneration​(int stepNum)
        This method shows a certain generation and if it is not as large as stepNum it evolves it to that number.
        Parameters:
        stepNum - the generation number to be returned
        Returns:
        the generation wanted

      • getCurrentGeneration

        public Generation getCurrentGeneration()
        This method returns the current generation.
        Returns:
        the current generation

      • getRuleNum

        public int getRuleNum()
        This method retrieves the current rule number.
        Returns:
        the rule number from the Rule class

      • getTotalSteps

        public int getTotalSteps()
        This method retrieves the total number of generations created.
        Returns:
        the last element in generations

      • saveEvolution

        public void saveEvolution​(java.lang.String filename)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        This method saves each evolution of the Automaton.
        Parameters:
        filename - the file to be searched
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if input from filename is not readable

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Displays a String representation of the Automaton.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        the String representation of the Automaton
